languages.text: {n}Вир бросает на вас испуганный взгляд.{/n} "Бункеры пали первыми, {mf|мой спаситель|моя спасительница}. Сначала от лап Кошмаров, после — от голода. Легче выживать небольшими группками, но и они потихоньку сгинули. Мы трое... уже очень давно никого живого не видали. Лишь трупы да бичи Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вир бросает на вас испуганный взгляд.{/n} "Бункеры пали первыми, {mf|мой спаситель|моя спасительница}. Сначала от лап Кошмаров, после — от голода. Легче выживать небольшими группками, но и они потихоньку сгинули. Мы трое... уже очень давно никого живого не видали. Лишь трупы да бичи Его".

languages.text: {n}Vir gives you a frightened look.{/n} "The bunkers were the first to fall, my saviour. Starvation finished what the Nightmares started. It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

Легче выживать небольшими группками, но и они потихоньку сгинули. Мы трое... уже очень давно никого живого не видали. Лишь трупы да бичи Его".

It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone alive for a while now, only the corpses and the Scourges."

It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

languages.text: {n}ヴィルは恐怖に慄いた視線を送った。{/n}「地下壕は最初に陥落しました、救世主様。飢えは悪夢たちが始めたことを終わらせた。小さな集団で生き残ることは簡単でしたが、彼らも次々と死んでいった。私たち３人は…しばらくはほかの生存者を見ていません。あるのは屍と神の災厄だけです」
languages.original_text: {n}Vir gives you a frightened look.{/n} "The bunkers were the first to fall, my saviour. Starvation finished what the Nightmares started. It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィルは恐怖に慄いた視線を送った。{/n}「地下壕は最初に陥落しました、救世主様。飢えは悪夢たちが始めたことを終わらせた。小さな集団で生き残ることは簡単でしたが、彼らも次々と死んでいった。私たち３人は…しばらくはほかの生存者を見ていません。あるのは屍と神の災厄だけです」

languages.text: {n}Vir vous lance un regard terrifié.{/n} « Les bunkers ont été les premiers à succomber, {mf|Sauveur|Sauveuse}. La famine a achevé ce que les cauchemars avaient commencé. Il était plus facile de survivre en petits groupes, mais ils ont tout de même disparu les uns après les autres. Ça fait un certain temps qu'aucun de nous trois n'avait croisé quelqu'un en vie. Nous ne trouvons que des cadavres et Ses fléaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vir gives you a frightened look.{/n} "The bunkers were the first to fall, my saviour. Starvation finished what the Nightmares started. It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir vous lance un regard terrifié.{/n} « Les bunkers ont été les premiers à succomber, {mf|Sauveur|Sauveuse}. La famine a achevé ce que les cauchemars avaient commencé. Il était plus facile de survivre en petits groupes, mais ils ont tout de même disparu les uns après les autres. Ça fait un certain temps qu'aucun de nous trois n'avait croisé quelqu'un en vie. Nous ne trouvons que des cadavres et Ses fléaux. »

languages.text: {n}维尔朝你投来了惊恐的目光。{/n}“地堡里的人是最先死的，我的救世主。就算那些人没被梦魇杀害，也都一个个饿死了。小团体想活下来会稍微容易点，但那些人最后也都一点点死光了。我们三个……已经很久没见过活着的人了，只有尸体和神皇派来的灾祸使者。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vir gives you a frightened look.{/n} "The bunkers were the first to fall, my saviour. Starvation finished what the Nightmares started. It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

traits.locale_text: {n}维尔朝你投来了惊恐的目光。{/n}“地堡里的人是最先死的，我的救世主。就算那些人没被梦魇杀害，也都一个个饿死了。小团体想活下来会稍微容易点，但那些人最后也都一点点死光了。我们三个……已经很久没见过活着的人了，只有尸体和神皇派来的灾祸使者。”

languages.text: {n}Vir te lanza una mirada asustada.{/n} «Los búnkeres fueron los primeros en caer, mi {mf|salvador|salvadora}. El hambre remató lo que empezaron las pesadillas. Era más fácil sobrevivir en pequeños grupos, pero también perecieron uno tras otro. Nosotros tres... no hemos visto a nadie más con vida desde hace tiempo, solo cadáveres y Sus azotes».
languages.original_text: {n}Vir gives you a frightened look.{/n} "The bunkers were the first to fall, my saviour. Starvation finished what the Nightmares started. It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir te lanza una mirada asustada.{/n} «Los búnkeres fueron los primeros en caer, mi {mf|salvador|salvadora}. El hambre remató lo que empezaron las pesadillas. Era más fácil sobrevivir en pequeños grupos, pero también perecieron uno tras otro. Nosotros tres... no hemos visto a nadie más con vida desde hace tiempo, solo cadáveres y Sus azotes».

languages.text: {n}Vir blickt dich verängstigt an.{/n} "Die Bunker sind als Erstes gefallen, {mf|mein Retter|meine Retterin}. Der Hunger hat zu Ende gebracht, was die Albträume begonnen hatten. Es war leichter, in kleinen Gruppen zu überleben, doch auch die sind eine nach der anderen gestorben. Wir drei ... haben schon lange keine anderen Lebenden mehr gesehen, nur die Leichen und seine Geißeln."
languages.original_text: {n}Vir gives you a frightened look.{/n} "The bunkers were the first to fall, my saviour. Starvation finished what the Nightmares started. It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir blickt dich verängstigt an.{/n} "Die Bunker sind als Erstes gefallen, {mf|mein Retter|meine Retterin}. Der Hunger hat zu Ende gebracht, was die Albträume begonnen hatten. Es war leichter, in kleinen Gruppen zu überleben, doch auch die sind eine nach der anderen gestorben. Wir drei ... haben schon lange keine anderen Lebenden mehr gesehen, nur die Leichen und seine Geißeln."

languages.text: {n}Vir sana korkmuş bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İlk düşen sığınaklar oldu kurtarıcım. Kâbusların başladığı işi açlık bitirdi. Küçük gruplar hâlindeyken hayatta kalmak daha kolaydı ama onlar da birbiri ardına hayata veda ettiler. Üçümüz kaldık... Başka hayatta kalan kimseyle karşılaşmadık, sadece cesetler ve O'nun musibetlerini gördük."
languages.original_text: {n}Vir gives you a frightened look.{/n} "The bunkers were the first to fall, my saviour. Starvation finished what the Nightmares started. It was easier to survive in small groups, but they too perished one after the other. The three of us... have not seen anyone else alive for a while now, only the corpses and His scourges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vir, sana korkmuş bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İlk düşen sığınaklar oldu kurtarıcım. Kâbusların başladığı işi açlık bitirdi. Küçük gruplar hâlindeyken hayatta kalmak daha kolaydı ama onlar da birbiri ardına hayata veda ettiler. Üçümüz kaldık... Başka hayatta kalan kimseyle karşılaşmadık, sadece cesetler ve O'nun musibetlerini gördük."
